SA15n1273:3: vedāḥ pramāṇaṃ smṛtayaḥ pramāṇaṃ dharmārthayuktaṃ vacanaṃ pramāṇam |
SA15n1273:4: yasya pramāṇaṃ na bhavetpramāṇaṃ kastasya kuryādvacanaṃ pramāṇam ||2 ||
SA15n1273:18: viśvāmitraṃ ca caṇḍālī vasiṣṭhaṃ caiva urvaśī |
SA15n1273:19: na teṣāṃ brāhmaṇī mātā lokācārācca brāhmaṇāḥ ||10 ||
SA15n1273:20: sadyaḥ patati māṃsena lākṣayā lavaṇena ca |
SA15n1273:23: viprāṇāṃ patanaṃ dṛṣṭvā tato māṃsāni varjayet ||12 ||
SA15n1273:24: brāhmaṇatvaṃ na śāstreṇa na saṃskārairna jātibhiḥ |
SA15n1273:25: na kulena na vedena na karmaṇā bhavettataḥ ||13 ||
SA15n1273:28: satyaṃ brahma tapo brahma brahma cendriyanigrahaḥ |
SA15n1273:29: sarvabhūte dayā brahma etad brāhmaṇa lakṣaṇam ||15 ||
SA15n1273:30: satyaṃ nāsti tapo nāsti nāsti cendriyanigrahaḥ |
SA15n1273:33: maithunaṃ nādhigacchanti te viprāste ca brāhmaṇāḥ ||17 ||
SA15n1273:35: caṇḍālo'pi hi tatrasthastaṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ ||18 ||
SA15n1273:58: na ca te brāhmaṇīputrāste ca lokasya brāhmaṇāḥ |
SA15n1273:60: śīlaṃ pradhānaṃ na kulaṃ pradhānaṃ kulena kiṃ śīlavivarjitena |
SA15n1273:61: bahavo narā nīcakula prasūtāḥ svargaṃ gatāḥ śīlamupetya dhīrāḥ ||30 ||
SA15n1273:63: urubhyāṃ vaiśyaḥ saṃjātaḥ padbhyāṃ śūdraka eva ca ||31 ||
SA15n1273:64: pāṇḍostu viśrutaḥ putraḥ sa vai nāmnā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ |
SA15n1273:66: ke ca te brāhmaṇāḥ proktāḥ kiṃ vā brāhmaṇalakṣaṇam |
SA15n1273:67: etadicchāmi bho jñātuṃ tad bhavān vyākaroti me ||33 ||
SA15n1273:70: yadā sarvaṃ para-dravyaṃ pathi vā yadi vā gṛhe |
SA15n1273:75: maithunaṃ hi sadā tyaktaṃ caturthaṃ brahmalakṣaṇam ||37 ||
SA15n1273:77: sarvabhūta dayā śaucaṃ tapaḥ śaucañca pañcamam ||38 ||
SA15n1273:79: tamahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ brūyāṃ śeṣāḥ śūdrā yudhiṣṭhira ||39 ||
SA15n1273:80: na kulena na jātyā vā kriyābhirbrāhmaṇo bhavet |
SA15n1273:81: caṇḍālo'pi hi vṛtastho brāhmaṇaḥ sa yudhiṣṭhira ||40 ||
SA15n1273:83: phalena na samarthaṃ ca brāhmaṇaḥ syādyudhiṣṭhira ||40 a ||
SA15n1273:86: sarve vai yonijā martyāḥ sarve mūtrapurīṣiṇaḥ |
SA15n1273:93: jīvitaṃ yasya dharmārthe parārthe yasya jīvitam |
SA15n1273:94: ahorātraṃ caretkṣāntiṃ taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ ||45 ||
SA15n1273:99: kṣamā dayā damo dānaṃ satyaṃ śaucaṃ smṛtirghṛṇā |
SA15n1273:106: muktaścarati yo dharmaṃ tameva brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ ||51 ||
SA15n1273:107: yadā na kurute pāpaṃ sarvabhūteṣu dāruṇam |
SA15n1273:108: kāyena manasā vācā brahma sampadyate tadā ||52 ||
SA15n1273:109: asmābhiruktaṃ yadidaṃ dvijānāṃ mohaṃ nihantuṃ hatabuddhiṃkānām |
SA15n1273:110: gṛhmantu santo yadi yuktametanmuñcantvathāyuktamidaṃ yadi syāt ||53 ||
